title: WaveSpeed AI - Extract Text from Images Instantly

hero.heading: Extract Text from Images
hero.description: Harness the power of AI to effortlessly extract and convert text from any image into editable formats.

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Extract text from the sign, pull text from the document, read the recipe from the image...

examples.heading: Before & After Examples
examples.description: Discover how WaveSpeed AI accurately extracts text, making your documents editable and accessible.

items.title: Extract Text from Signs
items.imageAlt: Example showing text extraction from a sign
items.description: Instantly convert hard-to-read text into digital format from images.

items.title: Convert Printed Documents
items.imageAlt: Example showing extraction from printed documents
items.description: Effortlessly digitize printed materials for easy editing and sharing.

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI?
features.description: Leverage our cutting-edge technology to extract text seamlessly from images.

items.title: Rapid Extraction
items.description: Receive accurate text results in seconds without long waiting times.

items.title: User-Friendly
items.description: No need for expert skills. Upload your image and let our AI handle the extraction.

items.title: Privacy Secured
items.description: Your images and extracted data remain secure and private on your device.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to extract text

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Drag and drop or browse for your image file. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP formats.

items.title: AI Extraction
items.description: Our advanced AI accurately detects and extracts text while maintaining high fidelity.

items.title: Download Result
items.description: Review the extracted text and download it in your preferred format.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join a community of delighted users who streamline their text extraction with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Jessica Lee
items.comment: This tool revolutionized how I handle paperwork! Extracting text is quick and hassle-free.

items.name: David Kim
items.comment: As a student, I find this feature invaluable for converting my notes into editable text!

items.name: Emily Davis
items.comment: I appreciate the speed and accuracy. It saves so much time on my projects.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about AI text extraction

items.title: What types of text can be extracted?
items.description: Our technology can extract printed text from signs, documents, labels, and more, accurately converting various fonts and styles into digital text.

items.title: Is the text extraction service free?
items.description: Yes! Users receive 30 free credits daily, enough to extract text from multiple images. Additional credits can be earned through surveys or challenges.

items.title: Can I use extracted text for commercial projects?
items.description: Yes, users with subscriptions can utilize extracted text for commercial purposes. Free-tier users can use it for personal projects only.

items.title: How is user privacy protected?
items.description: All image processing is conducted in-browser, ensuring your data never leaves your device, providing complete privacy and security.

footer.heading: Ready to Extract Text from Your Images?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI today and simplify your text extraction needs. No sign-up required.
